name: Former Terra
description:
After another one of your questionable experiments, you find yourself trapped in a strange new world. Thankfully, you have your trusty tools of destruction to shape the terrain so you can better explore the earth. Can you find the keys to open the portal so you can go back home?

Controls:

Move using arrow keys or WASD. Jump using the spacebar. Press 1, 2, 3, or 4 to enable/disable each tool. Press shift to activate a tool. Hold shift and press movement key(s) to activate a tool that requires a direction. Some tools can be combined. If you fall off the level, the level resets, so we recommend you explore first before trying to collect the keys.  

Press ESC to show the tutorial
